item.title: DIY Dev-Containers
item.description: Why we use Dev-Containers What I want The Beginnings Docker In Docker Secrets Management Portability Wrapping it up Like most developers, I spend an unruly amount of time dealing with my local installs and dependencies. When working across multiple projects, I find itâ€™s not uncommon to have to deal with conflicting versions of dependencies and although virtual environments and node package manager go a long way to fixing this problem, it still often falls short.
